description:
This is a wrapper for the Pango text rendering library (http://www.pango.org) that makes its features available for use with PHP via object-oriented and procedural APIs.

Requirements:
* PHP 5.2+
* PECL/Cairo

The code is currently on GitHub; it will be moved to PECL SVN soon.
name: pango
summary: Wrapper for the Pango text rendering library
